comments.content: These look fantastically simple and delicious. Yum.

comments.author: Graeme
comments.content:
They look incredible. I saw the preview on Tastespotting and assumed that they were sweet.

I guess they'd work just as well alongside Ice-cream, wouldn't they?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I think that could work, definitely. Hold the mayo :). You might want to put a bit of sugar in the tempura batter then.

comments.author: Sophie
comments.content: We would like to feature this recipe on our blog.  Please email sophiekiblogger@gmail.com if interested.  Thanks :)

comments.author: Christie@fig&cherry
comments.content: This is fabulously creative! I've got some leftover (canned) lychees from a curry earlier on in the week. Going to make these tomorrow! Thanks so much for the inspiration. :)

comments.author: Cobi
comments.content: I found your blog while researching vegan amuse bouche recipes. My mind has just been blown with not one but three lychee recipes, brilliant!
